column2: also called Éadgifu in Old English
column3: was an Elf of Tol Eressëa. She was a niece of Vairë (wife of Lindo)
column4: the wife of Lindo. She was also the wife of Eriol and the mother to Heorrenda.

column1: In another version a woman named Éadgifu was the wife of a man named Déor (father of Ælfwine) and the mother of Ælfwine.
Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
